005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
009
010import java.util.List;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013
014/**
015 * A service interface used to provide implementations of data types represented
016 * as {@link IDataTypeAdapter} instances.
017 * <p>
018 * Multiple providers can be used to support dynamic data type discovery in an
019 * Metaschema-based application, allowing data type extensions to be loaded at
020 * runtime using the {@link DataTypeService}.
021 */
022public interface IDataTypeProvider {
023  /**
024   * Get the type information for abstract item types that do not have an
025   * associated data type adpater.
026   *
027   * @return the abstract item types provided
028   */
029  List<? extends IAtomicOrUnionType<?>> getAbstractTypes();
030
031  /**
032   * Get the {@link IDataTypeAdapter} instances associated with this provider.
033   *
034   * @return the sequence of adapters in match priority order
035   */
036  @NonNull
037  List<? extends IDataTypeAdapter<?>> getJavaTypeAdapters();
038}
